data.system_settings: Ubuntu 16.04 LTS, Asus Netbook F551C, Intel Core i3 64bits
data.expected_result: Language syncs and applies normally on Desktop
data.short_description: Changing the language on mobile while you are viewing Audit Logs on Desktop crashes Discord
data.steps_to_repro: - On Desktop app, go to Server Settings > Audit Logs - On mobile app, go to Settings > Language - Make sure Sync across clients is enabled - Change language - Observe Desktop
